= Configuration files =

* [[ini_files/vimrc|.vimrc]]


<Leader>ww or <Plug>VimwikiIndex
        Open index file of the wiki.
<Leader>wt or <Plug>VimwikiTabIndex
        Open index file of the [count]'s wiki in a new tab.
<Leader>ws or <Plug>VimwikiUISelect
        List and select available wikies.
